pageInstruction1: Other pay codes control the accounting and reporting accumulation for nonregular pay. These are comparable to "earnings codes" in your previous DMS. Common examples of other pay codes include: commission, jury duty, bonus, and vacation.
pageInstruction2: The following four pay codes are system defined in the Dealertrack DMS, and must be used regardless of what code was for these items in your current system:
pageInstruction3:
• VAC: Vacation
  • PTO: Paid Time Off
  • HOL: Holiday
  • OVT: Overtime
pageInstruction4: Please note that on the paycheck stub, two different subtotals will likely display for the other pay type, if a different code was used on your prior system.
